ValidationRule.description: For the OE opportunities user should be allowed to change Stage value only after associating an opportunity product
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), ((Record_Type_Name__c=='OE Standard' ||Record_Type_Name__c=='OE Complex') && Total_Product_Count__c==0 && ISPICKVAL(SBU__c, "ATR") && (NOT(ISPICKVAL (StageName, 'Closed Cancelled')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL (StageName, 'Cultivate')) && NOT(ISPICKVAL (StageName, 'Prospecting')))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please add an Opportunity Product prior to proceeding past the Cultivate Stage
